Author: avoao
Text: I'm really sorry you've had such a rough time, and that it's getting especially hard to manage with everything else going on. I get your frustration even if they're only trying to help. Sometimes it helps to know that other people care and are looking out for you and noticing you're struggling, and sometimes it doesn't. Is there a way you can dissuade further confrontation without alienating everyone? Maybe over text/email if talking out loud is too much?  I hope it somehow gets easier for you soon!
